Cf: ''[[Knowing the pathophysiology of haemorrhoids 2C-288-EP-B01|2C-288-EP-B01]]''''

question.question: What are the main factors favouring haemorrhoidal pathology?
question.option_a: Genetic predisposition, poor diet, and lack of physical activity
question.option_b: Genetic predisposition, poor diet, and chronic constipation
question.option_c: Poor diet, lack of physical activity, and chronic diarrhea
question.option_d: Genetic predisposition, poor diet, and excessive sitting
